channel.title: domain on Fan's life
channel.description: Recent content in domain on Fan's life

item.title: DNS
item.description: How to Check Domainâ€™s Nameservers 1 2 nslookup -type=ns yourdomain.tld dig ns yourdomain.tld How to check DNS record 1 dig yourdomain.tld +nostats +nocomments +nocmd chinadns 1 2 curl 'http://ftp.apnic.net/apnic/stats/apnic/delegated-apnic-latest' | grep ipv4 | grep CN | awk -F\| '{ printf("%s/%d\n", $4, 32-log($5)/log(2)) }' > chnroute.txt chinadns -c chnroute.txt -s 223.5.5.5,119.29.29.29,208.67.222.222:443,8.8.8.8

item.title: GCC
item.description: 1 Compiler Options We strongly recommend compiling with at least the following warning options: 1 -Wall -Wsign-compare -Wwrite-strings -Wtype-limits -Werror Recent versions of gcc also support an option -fsanitize=address which will generate code that includes extra checking to help detect a variety of problems at runtime. Using this option is also strongly recommended during your development cycle. Valgrind Run valgrind with --track-origins=yes to determine the source of the error.
